website_summaries.verdict: A heavy duty rack that tries its best to secure multiple bikes on the back of any vehicle.
pros: Fits up to 5 thin bikes on a solid frame
Looks really good on back of car
cons: Supporting straps and holders are somewhat flimsy
Multiple bikes will rattle and bump against each other during travel

customer_reviews.title: Here's the secret -
customer_reviews.text: Our bikes each weigh close to 40 lbs. This rack meets the challenge. Sturdy, stable and easy to hitch and unhitch once you know the secret. They do not tell you that once the hitch lock cylinder is installed, you have to engage the key in the lock and turn the key in order to loosen (and tighten) the anti rattle/theft device and insert the rack into the hitch receiver. So you're thinking DUH right. It was anything but apparent to a pretty handy buyer and should be included in the assembly and installation instructions - DUH!
customer_reviews.author: R.E. Tired

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, easy to install. I use it almost every weekend, take about 2-3 minutes to put on, adjust and lock. I bough it with the lock option and its well worth it. I have been out several times and stopped long enough that i was glad i could lock up the bikes without removing them. If you have girls/womens bikes (without a straight bar) you need a Thule Frame Adapter 982XT, so the bike sits evenly. I have had 3 bikes on the rack at one time on the highway/interstate without any issues. Solid frame, built well and easy to use. Five stars for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Bike Rack
customer_reviews.text: Expected delivery was (2) days, but date when I received product was actually six (6) days. I spent an ample amount of time researching product, so I was a bit disappointed that product came with an adapter to fit an 2" receiver. This 9026 model clearly stated for 2" receivers only! Ordered this model as "new", but there's enough scuff marks and dust marks which leads me to believe otherwise. Overall, seems to be well made. I'll find out more after several uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jak-O-Trades

customer_reviews.title: great quality hitch but would be hard to hold 5 bikes.
customer_reviews.text: very high quality hitch. but do not plan to use it for 5 bikes!!! I have hard time fitting in 4. however I do have logistical issue thought, as I have 1 L men's road bike, 1 S women's cruiser, 1 S men's mountain bike and 1 20 inch preteen bike. so some go with frame, some with extension bar, some have to be raised and tilted. as kids bike would not fit on both handles through frame. this is the reason I bought 5 bike rack vs 4. as little longer handles still help!
customer_reviews.author: J. Jojishvili

customer_reviews.title: Bike rack broke on first road trip. The cast ...
customer_reviews.text: Bike rack broke on first road trip. The cast hitch pin snapped and the bikes were dragged behind the motor home for several miles before it was noticed. All 5 bikes damaged. Not very strong. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Duped

customer_reviews.title: Makes transporting your bikes a simple task
customer_reviews.text: Super bike rack that is clearly worth the extra cost even compared to the Vertex. The rack locks in the hitch tightly and the bikes are secured in place quickly and securely. The last thing you want to do after long tiring ride is spend time trying to figure out how to lash the bikes in place. It folds so small we store it in the corner of a closet
customer_reviews.author: RegularGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good, Durable Rack..
customer_reviews.text: Product initially arrived used but was rectified after a replacement. The rack itself is durable and easy to use, especially for road & mountain bikes. Installation took no more than 10 minutes. Fits my mountain bikes without any problems but the moment I try to add a cruiser bike (boardwalk bike) in there, its a whole situation in itself. Since cruiser bikes are shaped awkwardly, I dont blame the rack for giving me trouble (just prepare to twist and turn if you do own one).
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy as a rock with multiple bikes.
customer_reviews.text: One improvement area, make the key and hitch tightening mechanism better. Having he key in rotated position(attached to a heavy of keychain) while tightening the hitch tightener (again by rotating) is very tricky to master. The inserted ket rotates out of screwing position and it doesn't tighten when that occur, need to keep checking the key position has not rotated. Have lexus rx330 and manage to open close trunk door, without having to tilt the hitch. This is a plus in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Conscious Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product because I purchased one of those carrier that you place on the back of a car and it scratched my car badly even though I was careful in applying it. Love this thing and do not see any movement in rear view mirror so very securely protected and my SUV is not going to get any damage.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Torres Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy bike rack
customer_reviews.text: This is an awsome bike rack. Very good build quality and looks good too. Very easy to install and operate. I would have given it 5 stars except for the fact that it is not as easy to tilt when accessing your hatch when the bike rack is fully loaded. In my case you need to people to do this. One person operates the tilt lever while the other one supports the bikes as you tilt the rack. I would have wanted it to be lighter like the Thule helium, but that so far can only hold three bikes. Overall, pretty pleased with this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Alex G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike rack
customer_reviews.text: I been using this Thule bike rack since May 2019 almost every week to go either mountain or road biking, and I haven’t had any problem sometimes I only mount 3 bikes but most of the time we use it to its full capacity! I highly recommend this product from Thule..
customer_reviews.author: Daddy 1018

customer_reviews.title: fits behind a jeep wrangler jk just fine. however
customer_reviews.text: fits behind a jeep wrangler jk just fine. however, when it drops down, the jeep cannot open it's tailgate door. more meant for minivans and the like...
customer_reviews.author: Katie H.

customer_reviews.title: Locks into the hitch nice and tight, with great lock built in
customer_reviews.text: Besides the superior hardware quality that comes with Thule products, what makes this a great hitch rack is how the unit fits into the hitch with the tightening mechanisms which also locks for confidence out and about. (Just don't lose the key I guess!) Grateful for the speedy shipping and overall quality of this transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan T

customer_reviews.title: 5 bike Apex rack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cart around 5 bikes for the family but so far have only put 2 bikes on it. It's a heavy duty rack and has worked fine so far. The bikes/rack does block the backup camera(we have a Pilot) but that's the only issue to date
customer_reviews.author: Tim B

customer_reviews.title: No extra locks needed.
customer_reviews.text: No loose pins or extra cables needed to secure bikea or rack to vehicle. A little asaembly needed amd lots of extra pieces for added stability that you can use or not. Very happy with this rack. Sturdy and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Siggy0327

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: For 5 bikes probably the best you can get. I like rubber bands, it give you more flexability if you have to put kids bikes, co-pilot and etc.
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack
customer_reviews.text: Works well for this family of four. We hooked it to our Tahoe and our Durango fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: good features, easy to engage/disengage and to operate. very sturdy and nice finish. only two challenges a) loading bikes next to each other contiguously as it gets too tight. perhaps I need to learn the technique perhaps. b) unable to load kids bikes (18"). so I have to take them in the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Preethi Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy. Bike strap designs are unique such that they stay very stable on the rack.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Great Rack for 4 bikes
customer_reviews.text: I got this rack to carry 4 bikes for around 250 miles. I have used the rack two times and it works great. The only issue is if you have a bicycle with kids frame you need to get an adaptor. If not, there is very difficult to mount the bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Great rack.  Many comments on the solid foundation and desige.  Provided many people the web link to buy one.  Very Happy.
customer_reviews.text: Great rack. Many comments on the solid foundation and desige. Provided many people the web link to buy one. Very Happy.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL L. BURNS

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is Thule. That's all you need to know. Great quality product which makes me feel safe when driving with 4 bikes on the back of my SUV. It has two keys which lock the rack in the hitch and a second one to lock the bikes. Fast install and removal. I couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Well built rack! handles all 5 bicycles that my family owns. Very ridge design that didn't allow a lot of bouncing during transport. Kept me calm while driving longer distances!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Thule!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike rack! Very sturdy bike rack-the bikes hardly move. Easy to bend down to get access to your trunk. Love how it has the wheel to tighten it to the hitch instead of having to use any tools! Comes with its own bike lock. The only drawback is that you can't open the trunk with the bikes on the rack (but you have to pay more to get a bike rack that does that). Excellent delivery-arrived quickly and practically all assembled. Great choice if your transporting 4 bikes. Looks cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable transportation for you bicycle
customer_reviews.text: This Thule is a wonderful piece of equipment. I only wish that my bicycle worked as well as the Thule.
customer_reviews.author: Albany Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy cable lock that broke
customer_reviews.text: The cable lock was one of the main reasons I bought this. Thought this would be a secure rack. Not only is it extremely flimsy, but the cable popped out and Thule gives you no feasible way to take advantage of lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Bina Z.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to load and unload bikes
customer_reviews.text: With kids growing we sized down and got this bike carrier. Much more user friendly for loading bikes than our previous Thule.
customer_reviews.author: M H.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t lock with cable?
customer_reviews.text: Love it and have traveled over 2000 miles already with our bikes in tow. I can not lock the security cable! As if the mechanism the cable is to lock into isn’t on the rack at all?! Concerning. Any advice?
customer_reviews.author: Ann Sherry Miller

customer_reviews.title: Bike Rack
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase. First bike rack I've purchased. It is easy to attach to the hitch. Bikes did not move around. It is tight with 4 bikes, but if you follow the instructions for loading, they do fit. You will need an adapter for kids bikes or womens bikes.
customer_reviews.author: chriswcd

customer_reviews.title: perfect for all kinds of bikes
customer_reviews.text: perfect for all kinds of bikes. It takes a wile to find the right way to put a women's bike on but when you do it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing numerous bike racks I settled on this one because it had all the features I wanted: Easy to mount, Collapseable for better storage, holds 4 bikes,hold down straps work very easy, security cable and it's hinged so while the bikes are loaded on it you can tilt it down to gain acces to the bed or trunk of your vehicle if needed without taking all the bikes off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Good but I can't get 4 bikes on it
customer_reviews.text: Unless I'm willing to ruin a couple of my bike wheels by squeezing them in, there's no way to really get 4 bikes on this. I throw the 4th bike in the back of my Odyssey and use it for 3 bikes. Other than that, it works. Heads up, this thing is heavy!
customer_reviews.author: DanM

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Anywhere!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rack. It comes fully assembled except for the rubber straps which are very easy to install. It's a very solid rack and doesn't move around. It's really easy to use and keeps the bikes very secure with the locking mechanisms to the hitch and to the rack itself. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy bike rack
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy bike rack! This is must have if you are looking to invest in a reliable bike rack.
customer_reviews.author: Monet819

customer_reviews.title: I have the feeling these are second hand
customer_reviews.text: It came with some scratches that made me have the feeling I got a second hand product.... (??¿¿)
customer_reviews.author: Javier Pinzon Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good luck getting a reply from customer service...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with one of the blue shock absorbers, that are attached to the cradles, missing. I tried to contact Thule by phone and gave up after being on hold for an hour. Used their contact form instead and sent them a message about the missing part, including photos, and it has been over 3 days and not a single reply email or call. The silence is deafening, and if I don't hear back in another day or two, then this thing is going back.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Still a great rack though
customer_reviews.text: Wish they supplied more cords to help tie the bike in so it doesn't move while driving to hold handle bars and lessen sway. Ended up buying bungie cords to secure the bike. Still a great rack though.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design
customer_reviews.text: The Thule Apex 5 bike hitch rack does its job well carrying 3 bikes, plus it looks good. I purchased the 5 bike model only because I sometimes bike with family for a total of 4 bikes and wanted the extra room on the rack that the five rack model provides.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Hitch do not fit Toyota Highlander 2" standard receiver.
customer_reviews.text: Hitch do not fit Toyota Highlander 2" standard receiver. Returning the product
customer_reviews.author: Siva Bakthavachalam

customer_reviews.title: Works great, best rack I could find but it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, best rack I could find but it is expensive. It leans to the left when you tighten it down to the hitch, you'd link Thule would design it to mount perfectly vertical on a standard 2 inch receiver. Functions very well so far.
customer_reviews.author: CD15

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the rack and was a bargain for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Scribe

customer_reviews.title: Great bike rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rack. It is very sturdy. I like that it hinges away from the van so we can open the tail gate. It is heavy while connecting and disconnecting from the hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Weimer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.text: We have used the hitch a few times already. Very solid and easy to use. Fitting four bikes is difficult as space is limited.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay Jayachandran

customer_reviews.title: Slick rack
customer_reviews.text: The Thule 9025 is impressive... While not light, it's easy to move around with its well thought out carrying handle, and it mounts quite easily and doesn't rattle at all in the hitch receiver. Easy to load bikes, though 4 requires some finagling to get everything to line up so they fit together. Only con is that some of the tie-down pieces can fall off if you're not careful, though I simply use the elastic straps to attach them to each other when not in use, and the problem's solved.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lontai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy working and really good and still can open and close car back door easily
customer_reviews.author: Zaher Shehada

customer_reviews.title: Great rack. I got the 4 bikes version
customer_reviews.text: Great rack. I got the 4 bikes version, I used it for our trip to Maine in total over 1800 miles with 4 bikes on it, 2 adults and 2 kids mountain bikes (a Trek 29 for myself, my wife's Trek 26, my 11 years old Trek 24 and a 20 Specialized for my 7 years old) without any issues whatsoever. You just have to be careful how you load your bikes otherwise they will get scratches (if you care about them)
customer_reviews.author: Ciprian

customer_reviews.title: Strong carrier, thoughtful features.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and remove. Holds up to 4 bicycles very securely - no wobbling. Has built-in security features - both for the carrier and the bicycles being carried. Allows carrier to be folded while mounted to vehicle, plus allows access to rear cargo area of vehicle. Very convenient and excellent design and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Mjr2u

customer_reviews.title: Bike rack bliss
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well designed, this bike rack had us up and rolling quickly. Fit all four bikes easily. Only downfall was the need for hand strength when strapping in. Also, women's comfort bikes need cross bar too fit, but that was expected. This rack does not sway or feel loose at all.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to assemble, also easy to put on and take off the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: It can fit 4 bikes if they are all relatively light framed road bikes but we have only been able to fit three mountain bikes on at a time. The release feature that lets you drop the top section to a 45 degree angle is great because you can get into the trunk without taking the rack off completely. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Steph P.

customer_reviews.title: Thule 9026 Apex 5 Bike Hitch Rack - great option
customer_reviews.text: The rack fit the hitch perfectly. It held four bikes very well (we only have four at the moment, but soon to get five). It was very sturdy. I can see five not being a problem. The locks on it were very secure. We highly recommend for a four or five bike rake option to anyone looking.
customer_reviews.author: M. Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a 2015 Honda Odyssey Elite. Easy to install out of the box. On the heavy side, but then it has to support 5 bikes. Once on the hitch, it's pretty easy to open an close the rear trunk.
customer_reviews.author: A P

customer_reviews.title: It's OK but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Need to bring to shop to put on lift for installation. Hitch mount is too tight to rear and squeezes undercarriage molding. Sturdy design. Blocks rear camera view. Need to put down to open liftgate.
customer_reviews.author: yellow flying goose

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted and needed. Works fantastic! Holds the bikes in place and we don't have to worry about them getting scratched. And to boot, the price was better than what we could get it at any of the local stores. We were also looking at the comparable Yakima bike racks and what you get with the Thule 9025 Apex is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica - CO

customer_reviews.title: Issues
customer_reviews.text: Like the rack so far havent used it yet though ......keep you posted.There was a issue with the Thule name on the rack came scratched up would think they would be more careful with there name!
customer_reviews.author: country

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Old Philosophy: You get what you pay for! This item is built from quality materials and is a great design. Plenty of room to place bikes without being crowded. Hitch design is fantastic. I can install/remove the bike rack to/from my SUV in just a few seconds with no tools required. The added security lock is a plus too. (extra piece of mind) Even down to the strap, the hinge is metal and has gripping teeth to prevent it from loosening by accident. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Alphonso

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike rack
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike rack. Difficult at first to figure out how it slides into the trailer hitch (cryptic directions) and being heavy didn't help the process, but once I figured it out , not so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ressler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Sturdy. For 5 bikes there are few choices. I did also purchase a few of the Thule Frame Adapters for my wife's and two of my kid's bikes. The Rack would not be as effective without them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to fit 5 bikes.
customer_reviews.text: This bike rack is the worst! Each “cradle” for the bikes are spaced, but nothing is to prevent them from moving. This when on a long road trip they start migrating twords the end of the rack! Nightmare!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item for the Thule Apex 5 Hitch Rack.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Very convenient and easy to collapse and put away. Easy to attach, and put bikes on. The bike cable to lock it is held on by a flimsy screw that would be way too easy to break into.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Up to the expectative!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike rack! Not versatile enough to get it on and off every time, but you can leave it on and your trunk will work just fine. I have used it with 4 bikes with no issues at all. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Got 2 adult mountain bikes and 2 kids bikes on there no problem... Very happy
customer_reviews.author: George C. Guidera jr

customer_reviews.title: Also I don't like the rubber straps they use to hold the bike ...
customer_reviews.text: The lock that holds the rack to the hitch broke (disengaged) and the entire rack was stuck to the back of my truck and I couldn't get it off. After a ton of pulling and shaking I wiggled it out of there, packed it up in the box, and returned it. Also I don't like the rubber straps they use to hold the bike in place. You have to put them on, stretch and pull them in place and then take them off each time you put the bikes on and off. I returned the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Backman

customer_reviews.title: Love it - was a bit skeptical that it would ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it - was a bit skeptical that it would actually home 5 bikes but there were no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cards fan

customer_reviews.title: There is no way to fit 5 bikes on this
customer_reviews.text: The mazimum we could fit on it is 3. Otherwise it is very solid and looks good and is well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Orange L.

customer_reviews.title: Thule Apex 5
customer_reviews.text: Great design, awesome quality, you can't go wrong with Thule. We use it for two adults and three kids full size bike and does a tremendous job. Highly reccomended.
customer_reviews.author: Fireboy 431

customer_reviews.title: Everything it's advertsied it to be
customer_reviews.text: Defintely the best brand of Bike Hitch Racks available - easy to follow instructions - great looking on the car - easy to load/unload bikes - I would recommend the Thule 9025 Apex 4 Bike hitch to anyone looking for a bike rack for carrying 3-4 bikes
customer_reviews.author: Jerrold D McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This s a very well built product, the components just match or exceeds what you would expect. With the trend changing to carries where you stand up the bikes, this will only be a good choice for users like me that intend to carry 5 bikes, if I did not have that requirement I would have selected a model similar to Thule RideOn 9503.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: 5 bikes rack and also a fold-able one.meaning that after you fold it and maybe store it on the hidden trunk floor - in a 2" reciver you can fit a bull bar step for example. Best looking , arch shape - full size 5 bike capable rack.Great price for shipping to Romania.
customer_reviews.author: Bussy&

customer_reviews.title: the product arrived dirty and shredded like accessories used were sealed but the ...
customer_reviews.text: the product arrived dirty and shredded like accessories used were sealed but the performance was not the best. not satisfied with product presentation
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Estupinan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install... Easy to lower to open the rear door of our Buick Enclave... Great for family of 5!!!
customer_reviews.author: keith a dubauskas

customer_reviews.title: recommended....
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Nice features(locks, folding, light weight, anti-sway clips...) I would recommend this bike rack to others.
customer_reviews.author: ALM

customer_reviews.title: It will be nice to have a list of brand and model what ...
customer_reviews.text: This rack didn't fit in the official Subaru Forester hitch. It will be nice to have a list of brand and model what can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano Musacchi

customer_reviews.title: Great Rack, But Has to be Rigged to Fit Chevy Traverse 2011
customer_reviews.text: Every where we looked, this was listed as the best rack for 5 bikes on a Chevy Traverse 2011. Not so. The knob on top of the connector piece makes it impossible to slide into the hitch. But sending this monstrosity back was more hassle than just removing the knob and rigging it to work. Great rack. Just not for this particular vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: I want to return, but too late I guess
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on the vehicle, looks nice, that's about it. Instruction manual is terrible explaining how to use the lock, but I figured out by trial and error. It's very hard to put bikes on the rack, and the bikes swing as the car moves. There should be better way to secure the bikes other than using rubber bands with holes + small plastic "anti sway" thingy!!!!! The rubber thing where bike sits also slides forward and back too, and they almost broke in one occasion....
customer_reviews.author: Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This charger bike is the best. Easy, safe, and when transporting bicycles on tours or walks, no matter the distance.
customer_reviews.author: Daladier Lopez

product_meta.title: Thule Apex Bike Hitch Rack
product_meta.description: Thule’s premium hitch rack combines security, convenience and revolutionary new cradles with Road Dampening Technology (RDT) making it the most complete hitch rack on the market.
feature_bullets: 2" hitch mount carrier for transporting up to five bikes, that leans back when unloaded, allowing access to vehicle hatchbacks
Bikes lock to carrier, and carrier to vehicle using the included cable and hitch locks
Integrated auto pin functions as hitch pin, and moves into place with an audible click
Hold Fast cradles absorb the shock of the road protecting your bike during transport and patented No-Sway cages prevent bike to bike contact
Top-oriented hitch switch lever allows the arc style bike arms to fold down when not in use
DO NOT install on a trailer or other towed vehicle

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
